snippet: Opponents of a law requiring voters to provide photo ID asked a federal appeals court to reconsider a ruling last week that cleared the way for the law to take effect for the Nov. 4 elections.
abstract: Opponents of Wisconsin law requiring voters to provide photo ID ask federal appeals court to reconsider ruling that cleared the way for law to take effect for Nov elections.
lead_paragraph: Opponents of a law requiring voters to provide photo ID asked a federal appeals court to reconsider a ruling last week that cleared the way for the law to take effect for the Nov. 4 elections.

headline.main: Wisconsin: Full Court Asked to Halt Voter ID Law
headline.print_headline: Wisconsin: Full Court Asked to Halt Voter ID Law
